response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $12,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is an excellent chance to save $1,200 compared to the standard price. Please let me know if you are interested in this offer so we can proceed with the transaction. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10800}
